0101100110000011 0000001001010010 0 -> sum: 0101101111010101, cout: 0
1100010101100111 0100110011000011 0 -> sum: 0001001000101010, cout: 1
1011101111111111 1101010001000000 0 -> sum: 1001000000111111, cout: 1
1110011001110100 0001000110010010 1 -> sum: 1111100000000111, cout: 0
1011001001001111 1001001110001000 1 -> sum: 0100010111011000, cout: 1
0001110000101101 1100010000100010 1 -> sum: 1110000001010000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
